titles.ar: باب النَّظَرِ إِلَى نِسَاءِ أَهْلِ الذِّمَّةِ
titles.en: Chapter 160 – The looking at the women of the people under responsibility (Ahl Al-Zimma)

titles.ar: باب النَّظَرِ إِلَى نِسَاءِ أَهْلِ الذِّمَّةِ
titles.en: Chapter 160 – The looking at the women of the people under responsibility (Ahl Al-Zimma)

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ النَّوْفَلِيِّ عَنِ السَّكُونِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) لَا حُرْمَةَ لِنِسَاءِ أَهْلِ الذِّمَّةِ أَنْ يُنْظَرَ إِلَى شُعُورِهِنَّ وَ أَيْدِيهِنَّ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Al Nowfaly, from Al Sakuny, (It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘Rasool-Allahsaww said: ‘There is no Prohibition to look at the women of the Ahl Al-Zimma if one looks at their hair and their hands’.
